query:
SELECT
	CARRIER_SITE,
	MY_SITE.SERIAL_NUM SERIAL_NUM,
	laser1id,
	laser2id,
	laser3id,
	laser4id,
	laser1parttype,
	laser2parttype,
	laser3parttype,
	laser4parttype,
	PART_CODE_NAME
FROM
	(
	SELECT CARRIER_SITE, SERIAL_NUM
	FROM CARRIER_SITE
	WHERE carrier_serial_num = '149223856'
	) MY_SITE
LEFT JOIN
	(
	SELECT DISTINCT
		SERIAL_NUM,
		laser1id,
		laser2id,
		laser3id,
		laser4id,
		laser1parttype,
		laser2parttype,
		laser3parttype,
		laser4parttype,
		PART_CODE_NAME
	FROM los_assembly
	) MY_LAZER
ON MY_SITE.SERIAL_NUM = MY_LAZER.SERIAL_NUM
ORDER BY CARRIER_SITE
